Thinktiv and these companies may use tracking technologies, such as cookies, to collect information about users who view or interact with these advertisements and connect to the Thinktiv properties and/or software.

text:
Furthermore, Thinktiv shall have the right to retain records of all data pertaining to use of the website and applications including, but not limited to, usage, activity logs, and click-throughs.
Thinktiv may disclose such data to third parties provided it is grouped with other Highlight users' data and is presented in an aggregate form.
The demographic and profile data will be shared with third parties ONLY on an aggregate basis.

Thinktiv may use demographic and/or profile data to tailor the your experience on the Highlight website and/or applications, show you content that Thinktiv thinks you may be interested in, and display content according to your preferences.

Thinktiv may collect or receive information about each person who registers with Highlight including, but not limited to, user-name, password, first and last name, email address, street address, gender, occupation, and interests.

Global Positioning System Global Positioning System (GPS) tracking technology may need to be enabled in Thinktiv products and services in order to determine the location (latitude and longitude) of users of the Thinktiv products and services.
Thinktiv may also collect user location information, as further described in the "Global Positioning System" paragraph below.
This information is transmitted to Thinktiv, Thinktiv's users, and temporarily stored by Thinktiv.

Thinktiv, Inc. and its Highlight partners (collectively, "Thinktiv" or "we" or "us") has created this Privacy Policy in order to disclose its use of consumer data collected about you in conjunction with GetHighlight.com and the Highlight services (collectively, "Highlight").
Thinktiv also collects information on the pages you access, the materials that are processed by the service, and other information you may volunteer, such as survey information.
